Text: The best yetHey guys I an nearing the end of one of the best summers I have ever had and I am approaching what will probably be some of the exciting years yetattending SMU business school Anyways I am going to be movingon August th and I thought you might like to have my new address and phone Here they are Address Churchill Way Apt Dallas TX Phone I hope everything is going great with everybody If i left someone off the email list who might want this info pass it alongI just pulled my email list so it is probably incomplete Thanks Paul Thomas Do You Yahoo Get personalized email addresses from Yahoo Mail

Nathan ThomasHey Susan I hope things are going great Do you remember Nathan Thomas He is getting married on August thI will be one of the groomsmen I thought you might be interested Have fun Paul PS How are things going Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger

RE Nathan ThomasHey Susan I think my brother and his wife might be at Laura Jahnkes wedding as well you might say hello School starts in weeks I am really excited about starting I should learn at ton and get exposed to all sorts of things which will be helpful in the coming years My parents are driving up today to help me move into my new place closer to schoolmy parents are awesome RxSavercom is nearing completion Hopefully we will open for business in a few weeks Starting a business has been more of a challenge than i expected Just when things get rolling a challenge raises its ugly little head But I love it It is alot more fun than a job and there is alot more potential to hit a homerun Anyways I hope life is going great Say hello to Allan and Lisa for me Have fun Paul wrote Paul So nice to hear from you I hope things are going great for you as well Im actually going Laura Jahnkes wedding that same evening Otherwise I would have loved to have gone Please tell Nathan I say hello and wish he and his new wife the very best So when does school start And how are the small businesses going Have a nice time at the wedding Susan Original Message From Paul Thomas ENRON
